review: I had been using a Google Chromecast, but immediately replaced it when HBO Now became available for the Fire TV and Fire TV Stick.  Here are the details...With the addition of HBO Now to the Fire TV lineup, purchasing this for my kitchen TV was a no-brainer.  I already have a Fire TV for our main television, and decided to go with the smaller and more discreet Fire TV Stick for the kitchen.The result?  A smooth experience.  Adding the HBO Now app to the stick was effortless, and then all I needed to do was enter my username and password and I was set to go.I also use this for Netflix, Hulu Plus, and of course Amazon's own video streaming, and am happy with the results there, too.This uses a slower processor than the full-blown Fire TV, but the difference is barely noticeable.  I guess the stick is slightly less "peppy", but it does not affect the overall experience.  Note that voice recognition is NOT part of the Fire TV Stick.
